dictionary.name: Carthage
dictionary.meaning: Carthage was the centre or capital city of the ancient Carthaginian civilization, on the eastern side of the Lake of Tunis in what is now the Tunis Governorate in Tunisia.

dictionary.name: Syracuse
dictionary.meaning: Syracuse is a historic city in Sicily, the capital of the province of Syracuse. The city is notable for its rich Greek history, culture, amphitheatres, architecture, and as the birthplace of the preeminent mathematician and engineer Archimedes.

dictionary.name: Greek
dictionary.meaning: The Greeks are an ethnic group native to Greece, Cyprus, southern Albania, Turkey, Sicily, Egypt and other countries surrounding the Mediterranean Sea.

dictionary.name: charismatic
dictionary.meaning: adjective. Exercising a compelling charm that inspires devotion in others.

dictionary.name: many gods
dictionary.meaning: Ancient Greek theology assumes that there were many gods and goddesses. There was a hierarchy of deities, with Zeus, the king of the gods, having a level of control over all the others. Some god or goddess had dominion over certain aspects of nature.

dictionary.name: laurel wreath
dictionary.meaning: A laurel wreath is a circular wreath made of interlocking branches and leaves of the bay laurel. This is an evergreen whose leaves give off a pleasant scent. The wreath is traditionally worn on the head. In Greek mythology, the god Apollo is shown wearing a laurel wreath because of the story of Apollo and Daphne. In Ancient Greece it was given to special people, such as winners in competitions in poetry or sports, such as the Ancient Olympic Games.

dictionary.name: furious
dictionary.meaning: adjective: Extremely angry

dictionary.name: Hiero
dictionary.meaning: Hiero II was King of Syracuse and an important Greek figure.

dictionary.name: cobbled
dictionary.meaning: adjective. (of an area or roadway) Paved with cobbles.

dictionary.name: agora
dictionary.meaning: The agora was a central public space in ancient Greek city-states. The literal meaning of the word is gathering place or assembly. The agora was the center of athletic, artistic, spiritual and political life of the city.

dictionary.name: fishmonger
dictionary.meaning: A fishmonger is someone who sells raw fish and seafood.

dictionary.name: confectioner
dictionary.meaning: A manufacturer of or dealer in confections. A confection is a fancy dish or sweet food, or a work of fine or elaborate craftsmanship.

dictionary.name: crotchety
dictionary.meaning: adjective. Irritable, bad-tempered, grumpy.

dictionary.name: accusatory
dictionary.meaning: adjective. Indicating or suggesting that one believes a person has done something wrong.

dictionary.name: guffaw
dictionary.meaning: noun. A loud and boisterous laugh.

dictionary.name: uproar
dictionary.meaning: noun. A loud and impassioned noise or disturbance.

dictionary.name: astir
dictionary.meaning: adjective. In a state of excited movement.

dictionary.name: lesser
dictionary.meaning: adjective. Not so great or important as the other or the rest.

dictionary.name: facade
dictionary.meaning: noun. The face of a building, especially the principal front that looks onto a street or open space.

dictionary.name: ajar
dictionary.meaning: adverb & adjective. (of a door or other opening) Slightly open.

dictionary.name: frazzled
dictionary.meaning: verb. Because to feel completely exhausted; wear out.

dictionary.name: latitude and longitude coordinates
dictionary.meaning: A geographic coordinate system is a coordinate system used in geography that enables every location on Earth to be specified by a set of numbers, letters or symbols. Latitude is a geographic coordinate that specifies the north–south position of a point on the Earth's surface. Longitude is a geographic coordinate that specifies the east-west position of a point on the Earth's surface.

dictionary.name: Prime Meridian
dictionary.meaning: A prime meridian is a line of longitude in a geographical coordinate system at which longitude is defined to be 0°.

dictionary.name: Greenwich
dictionary.meaning: Greenwich is an early-established district of south east London, England, centered 5.5 miles (8.9 km) east southeast of Charing Cross.

dictionary.name: density
dictionary.meaning: Density of a substance is its mass per unit volume.

dictionary.name: toga
dictionary.meaning: The toga, a distinctive garment of Ancient Rome, was a roughly semicircular cloth, between 12 and 20 feet in length, draped over the shoulders and around the body. It was usually woven from white wool, and was worn over a tunic. In Roman historical tradition, it is said to have been the favored dress of Romulus, Rome's founder; it was also thought to have been worn by both sexes, and by the citizen-military.

dictionary.name: sprinting
dictionary.meaning: noun. The competitive athletic sport of running distances of 400 meters or less.

dictionary.name: bickering
dictionary.meaning: verb. Argue about petty and trivial matters.
